original_text: Moses came down from Sinai mountain. He carried the two stones of the covenant in his hands. As he came down the mountain, he did not know that his face was shining. His face was shining because he had spoken with the Lord.
korean_text: 모세가 그 증거의 두 판을 모세의 손에 들고 시내 산에서 내려오니 그 산에서 내려올 때에 모세는 자기가 여호와와 말하였음으로 말미암아 얼굴 피부에 광채가 나나 깨닫지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: Moses came down from Sinai mountain.
He carried the two stones of the covenant in his hands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 양손에 언약의 두 돌판을 들고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: As he came down the mountain,
he did not know that his face was shining.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 얼굴이 빛나고 있다는 것을 알지 못했습니다.

sentences.original_text: because he had spoken with the Lord.
